caption:
Bring More Joy to Your Glow! 🎀✨

Glow brighter with forever favourites Glow Tonic and Makeup Fixing Mist, all dressed up with a delightful and limited-edition @HelloKitty flair! Add a touch of playful charm to your everyday Glow routine with these must-have formulas:

🌟 Glow Tonic – Award-winning and iconic, this Glycolic Acid toner gently exfoliates and purifies for a brighter, radiant complexion. Aloe Vera soothes and hydrates, while Ginseng energizes and refines for instant enhancements of your unique Glow.

💖 Makeup Fixing Mist – Whether at home or on the go, this refreshing mist fixes and prolongs makeup wear while keeping skin hydrated and balanced. Infused with Rose Water to soothe, Green Tea to protect and Willow Bark Extract to balance, it ensures a seamless, fresh-faced finish every time.

Embrace your Glow, elevate your radiance, and celebrate your own unique signature Glow every day! ✨🎀

#PixiBeauty #GlowTonic #Skintreats #OnTheGlow #GlowGoals #BowMeetsGlow #HelloKitty
